body_html:
Then closing this issue.

later this month, we will move all windows support onto bazel.
I think it will look slightly different, and we will be able to use bazel's incremental build then.

Until bazel arrives, I suggest tring suggestions at #6396.
Closing this issue.

I think it will look slightly different, and we will be able to use bazel's incremental build then.
Until bazel arrives, I suggest tring suggestions at #6396.
Closing this issue.
body:
Then closing this issue.

later this month, we will move all windows support onto bazel.
I think it will look slightly different, and we will be able to use bazel's incremental build then.

Until bazel arrives, I suggest tring suggestions at #6396.
Closing this issue.
